snippet: A grand jury was scheduled to meet Wednesday to begin hearing evidence in the shooting of Michael Brown, as the unrest prompted by his death appeared to reach a turning point.

byline.original: By ALAN BLINDER and CAMPBELL ROBERTSON

lead_paragraph: A grand jury was scheduled to meet Wednesday to begin hearing evidence in the shooting of Michael Brown, as the unrest prompted by his death appeared to reach a turning point.

headline.main: As Tension Eases on Ferguson’s Streets, Focus Turns to Investigation
headline.print_headline: As Tension Eases on Ferguson’s Streets, Focus Turns to Investigation
